data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Çinar, Melih Ertan (2005): Syllis ergeni: a new species of Syllidae (Annelida: Polychaeta) from Izmir Bay (Aegean Sea, eastern Mediterranean Sea). Zootaxa 1036: 43-54, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.169735
